issue.subject: As an Agile team, I'd like to learn about Scrum >> Click the "SAM-1" link at the left of this row to see detail in the Description tab on the right
issue.description: About Scrum<br/><br/>Scrum is an iterative approach to Agile software development. The methodology has been around since the 1980s but was popularised by Jeff Sutherland and Ken Schwaber. <br/><br/>Scrum breaks the development of a product down in to discrete iterations (termed Sprints) that each deliver functionality that could potentially be shipped to users.<br/><br/>The Scrum Alliance offers an excellent [introduction to Scrum http://www.scrumalliance.org/resources/47] that provides an overview of key Scrum concepts, stakeholders, processes and artefacts.
